resources.string: Would you like to start a trip?
Press on the toggle to start your trip

We are currently facing issues in detecting potholes in bumper to bumper and slow moving traffic
 Please bear with us while this is improved

 Please clamp the device on a mobile holder for the best accuracy
Potholes are a major source of a lot of problems we see on Indian roads. Slow moving traffic, lower mileage, high maintenance and injuries, all of these issues are linked to potholes and poor roads.

Because this problem exists everywhere and happens all through the year, the government cannot fix everything efficiently. Citizens must take action sometimes. In fact, some students have found ways to fix small potholes. The data collected here can help use identify areas where we can take action without government intervention 

We want to enable everyone in taking small steps to collectively help solve this big problem. 

Solve small, dent big!
Turn on the app, drive and contribute. It\'s that simple.
No location detected. Make sure location is enabled on the device.
Location permission is needed for core functionality
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
Hi! Check out this app to map potholes on Indian streets and help make our roads safer.
Contribute to a global map of potholes on the road and ensure your own safety.
Simply click the orange play button to start logging. Press the stop button to stop logging (preferably on a holder).
After every trip of more than half a kilometre, we\'ll show you a map.\nThe red markers represent definite potholes - watch out for them in the future.
